lifestyle.home_ownership: Owns home (often paid off or nearly paid off)
lifestyle.technology_comfort: Basic to moderate (smartphone, tablet, basic computer)
lifestyle.media_consumption: Traditional TV, local news, conservative talk radio

financial_planning.description: Images showing financial security, planning, and wealth management

situations.title: Kitchen Table Planning Session
situations.description: Senior couple (early 60s) sitting at their kitchen table with financial documents, calculator, and laptop. Warm, homey lighting. Papers spread out showing statements, tax forms, and handwritten notes.
situations.emotional_tone: Serious but hopeful, taking control of their future
situations.context: Reviewing retirement accounts, planning for next phase

situations.title: Meeting with Financial Advisor
situations.description: Professional meeting in advisor's office. Senior couple (mid-60s) in business casual attire, advisor in suit. Documents on desk, charts on wall. Comfortable, trustworthy atmosphere.
situations.context: Annual review, major financial decisions

situations.title: Home Office Financial Review
situations.description: Senior man (late 60s) in home office, reviewing investment statements on computer. Bookshelf with financial books, family photos, comfortable chair. Natural lighting.
situations.context: Regular portfolio monitoring, staying engaged with finances

home_and_housing.description: Images related to home ownership, downsizing, and housing decisions

situations.title: Empty Nest Home Tour
situations.description: Senior couple walking through their large family home, pointing to empty bedrooms. House is well-maintained but feels too big. They're discussing next steps.
situations.context: Children moved out, house feels too large

situations.title: Reverse Mortgage Consultation
situations.description: Senior couple meeting with reverse mortgage specialist in their living room. Documents on coffee table, home equity information displayed. Comfortable, familiar setting.
situations.context: Considering accessing home equity for retirement income

situations.title: Active Adult Community Tour
situations.description: Senior couple walking through a well-maintained 55+ community. Single-story homes, community amenities visible. They're meeting with a real estate agent.
situations.emotional_tone: Excited about possibilities, considering lifestyle change
situations.context: Exploring downsizing to maintenance-free living

health_and_wellness.description: Images showing active, healthy aging and medical considerations

situations.title: Active Senior Fitness Class
situations.description: Group of seniors (60-75) in a community center fitness class. Low-impact exercises, supportive environment. Instructor is also a senior. Everyone is smiling and engaged.
situations.context: Staying healthy and active in retirement

situations.title: Medical Consultation
situations.description: Senior couple in doctor's office, discussing health concerns. Doctor is middle-aged, professional. Medical charts visible, comfortable consultation room.
situations.emotional_tone: Concerned but proactive, seeking medical guidance
situations.context: Regular health checkup, discussing age-related concerns

situations.title: Regenerative Medicine Consultation
situations.description: Senior man (early 70s) meeting with regenerative medicine specialist. Modern medical office, before/after photos on wall, treatment options displayed.
situations.context: Considering alternative treatments for age-related conditions

family_and_legacy.description: Images showing family connections, legacy planning, and intergenerational relationships

situations.title: Multi-Generational Family Gathering
situations.description: Large family gathering in senior couple's home. Grandchildren playing, adult children helping with dinner, grandparents watching with pride. Warm, loving atmosphere.
situations.context: Holiday gathering, family traditions

situations.title: Estate Planning Meeting
situations.description: Senior couple meeting with estate planning attorney in their home. Legal documents on dining room table, family photos visible. Serious but comfortable discussion.
situations.context: Creating or updating estate plan

situations.title: Helping Adult Children
situations.description: Senior couple writing a check or discussing financial help with their adult child (40s). Kitchen table setting, supportive conversation. Adult child looks grateful.
situations.context: Providing financial assistance to adult children

retirement_lifestyle.description: Images showing retirement activities, travel, and leisure pursuits

situations.title: Retirement Travel Planning
situations.description: Senior couple at travel agency or on computer, planning a trip. Brochures, maps, and travel guides spread out. They're excited about upcoming adventure.
situations.context: Planning bucket list trip, using retirement savings

situations.title: Hobby and Craft Room
situations.description: Senior woman in her craft room or workshop, working on a project. Well-organized space, tools and materials, completed projects visible. Focused and content.
situations.context: Pursuing hobbies in retirement, personal fulfillment

situations.title: Volunteer Work
situations.description: Senior couple volunteering at local food bank or community center. Helping others, wearing volunteer badges, working alongside other volunteers.
situations.context: Using retirement time to help community

technology_and_modern_life.description: Images showing seniors adapting to modern technology and digital tools

situations.title: Learning New Technology
situations.description: Senior couple taking a computer or tablet class at community center. Instructor (younger adult) helping them, patient and encouraging. Other seniors in class.
situations.context: Learning to use technology for banking, shopping, communication

situations.title: Video Chat with Family
situations.description: Senior couple on video call with grandchildren. Tablet or computer screen showing happy children, grandparents smiling and waving. Comfortable home setting.
situations.context: Using technology to maintain family connections

situations.title: Online Banking and Bill Pay
situations.description: Senior man at computer, reviewing bank statements and paying bills online. Reading glasses, organized desk, financial documents nearby.
situations.context: Using online banking for convenience and control

concerns_and_challenges.description: Images addressing common retirement concerns and financial challenges

situations.title: Healthcare Cost Worry
situations.description: Senior couple looking at medical bills and insurance statements. Concerned expressions, calculator nearby, health insurance cards on table.
situations.context: Facing unexpected medical expenses, insurance coverage gaps

situations.title: Market Volatility Concern
situations.description: Senior man watching financial news on TV, looking at investment statements. Concerned expression, market charts visible, retirement accounts displayed.
situations.context: Market downturn affecting retirement savings

situations.title: Long-term Care Planning
situations.description: Senior couple visiting assisted living facility or meeting with long-term care specialist. Brochures and information packets, serious discussion.
situations.emotional_tone: Thoughtful, planning ahead, considering future needs
situations.context: Planning for potential long-term care needs

photography_style.lighting: Natural, warm lighting - avoid harsh or clinical lighting
photography_style.color_palette: Warm, earthy tones - browns, golds, soft blues, muted greens
photography_style.composition: Comfortable, lived-in settings - avoid sterile or overly modern environments
photography_style.authenticity: Real people, genuine expressions - avoid stock photo clich√©s

content_application.homepage_hero: Kitchen Table Planning Session - shows approachable, relatable financial planning
content_application.service_pages: Meeting with Financial Advisor - professional, trustworthy consultation
content_application.blog_articles: Home Office Financial Review - independent, self-directed approach
content_application.social_media: Multi-Generational Family Gathering - emotional connection, family values
content_application.email_campaigns: Active Senior Fitness Class - positive, active aging message
content_application.landing_pages: Reverse Mortgage Consultation - specific solution, home-based setting

middle_america_characteristics: Suburban and rural settings preferred over urban
Traditional family values and community connections
